name: The Little Spirit Of Chaos
description:
WEBGAME FOR COMPUTER

This is the jam version of the Brackeys-2021.2 Game jam. After playing the jam version and rating it, you can consider playing the non-jam version (Fixed major bugs and balanced) --> https://no-whone.itch.io/the-little-spirit-of-chaos-fixed (but don't let the fixed version affect your rating!)

- The Little Spirit Of Chaos -

CONTROLS:

  • MOVEMENT: Arrow Keys
  • MELEE: R
  • DASH: Space
  • SKILLS: 1, 2, 3, 4

OBJECTIVE:

Destroy huts to progress and build your skillset until reaching the boss. Be careful! Destroying huts turns them into a spawner, meaning the more huts you destroy, the more CHAOTIC it gets. You also get to learn new skills the more huts you destroy. Once all the huts are destroyed, you get to face the BIG BAD.  Defeat the big bad and it's over.
